name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, particularly within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and **AWS**, with intensive hands-on experience in building **RESTful** services and implementing **CI/CD** pipelines. Adept at leveraging **Git** for version control and employing **DevOps** practices to ensure efficient deployment and operational excellence. Experienced in utilizing **PostgreSQL** for database management and aligning with **Serverless** architectures to optimize system performance.

Demonstrates strong capabilities in AI and ML technologies, with a proven record of creating applications that facilitate predictive analytics and automation through **Machine Learning** models. Moreover, possesses a solid understanding of **Agile** and **Scrum** methodologies, fostering effective team collaboration. Known for strong analytical skills and effective communication, ensuring alignment of technical solutions with business objectives.
